summary: A collection of utility functions that act as Snowflake UDFs, converting Snowflake native data types and arrays into Feast protobuf value messages and handling entity key serialization for feature lookups.
business_intent: Facilitate the integration of the Feast feature store with Snowflake by providing the necessary typeâ€‘conversion logic for Snowpark UDFs, enabling feature data to be retrieved and interpreted correctly within Snowflake queries.
